comment.author: 31782678@N07
comment._content: Looks like a scene from Australia.

comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: From Object Description: "A man on a horse, another holding two horses, and a sleeping dog are visible on the dirt road outside the house. The house has been identified as 'Myrtle Vale' at Bungowannah, 15 km east of Albury, owned by the Shipard family. It is currently owned by Olive Mary Shearer whose mother Florence was a Shipard."

comment.author: 33756661@N07
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called The Family Home, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
